description: This file provides utility functions for processing Markdown text into HTML, including escaping HTML entities, inline formatting (bold, italics, code, links), and rendering a subset of Markdown to HTML with support for headings, lists, code blocks, and paragraphs.

methods.name: escapeHtml(s)
methods.description: Converts special characters in a string to their corresponding HTML entities to prevent HTML injection.

methods.name: inlineMd(s)
methods.description: Applies inline Markdown formatting such as code snippets, bold, italics, and links to a given string.

methods.name: renderMarkdownToHtml(markdown)
methods.description: Converts a small subset of Markdown syntax into corresponding HTML, supporting headings, lists, code blocks, and paragraphs.
